---
title: "Knot tying learning objectives"
output: html_document
css: style.css
---

Students will be able to tie the following knots in an application similar to those listed:

* Bowline (attach a line to an anchor)
* Cleat hitch (cleat off a boat's dock line)
* Clove hitch and half hitch (secure a line to a piling)
* Figure eight knot (stop a line from passing through a concrete anchor hole)
* Lobster buoy hitch (secure a line to a buoy)

The following websites have good tutorials:
[Discover boating](https://www.discoverboating.com/resources/boating-knots) has video tutorials for the first four knots. [This YouTube video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1fi8OdQ1Iss) shows how to do the lobster buoy hitch.
